name: INSIDE the WORLD’S LONGEST FLIGHT: 18+ Hours NYC to Singapore
description:
Watch this video to see what it’s like to travel on the world’s LONGEST FLIGHT! This is Singapore Airlines flagship route from New York to Singapore.

We made the trip from New York’s JFK international airport to Singapore Changi Airport onboard Singapore Airlines Number 23!

This video will showcase what it’s like to travel onboard THE longest flight on planet earth! We’ll highlight everything you’ll experience in Singapore Airlines Business Class for more than 18 hours. 

You’ll see the (Disappointing) Business Class Lounges used by Singapore Airlines in New York (along with the brand new Chase Lounge and American Express Centurion Lounges at JFK, too), the quirky Singapore Airlines Ultra Long Haul Business Class seat, the tasty Singapore Airlines Business Class food, the Inflight Entertainment, and even get a sense for Singapore Airlines’ world-class onboard hospitality.

This Singapre Airlines A350ULR flight took us an incredible 18 hours and 9 minutes!

0:00 Introduction
1:15 Singapore Airlines JFK Check-in
2:58 Singapore AIrlines JFK Lounges
5:44 Boarding The World’s Longest Flight
7:33 Departing JFK
8:32 First Singapore Airlines Meal
10:56 Second Singapore Airlines Meal
13:43 JebScore
15:02 Price
16:05 Bloopers
